ActorFrame.children:
<ActorFrame Command="%function()
vocalizeList = { 'Alan' , 'Brandon' , 'Charles' , 'David' , 'Garrett' , 'Jayce' , 'Jim' , 'Joy' , 'Madame_Moisture' , 'Marissa' , 'Mark' , 'Matt' , 'Nick' , 'Phil' , 'Ryan' , 'Sara' , 'Shizuka' , 'Steven' , 'Tyler' , 'Vospi' } vocalizeListNoRandom = { 'Alessandro_italian' , 'Joy_swedish' , 'Panzer' , 'Shizuka_japanese' , 'Sirin_turkish' }
--vocalize = { 'Random' , 'Random' } -- defaults vocalize = { 'None' , 'None' } -- defaults
function VocalizeOption() local modList = { 'None' } for i,v in ipairs( vocalizeList ) do table.insert( modList , v ) end for i,v in ipairs( vocalizeListNoRandom ) do table.insert( modList , v ) end table.insert( modList , 'Random' ) table.insert( modList , 'Blender' )
local t = { Name = 'Vocalize', LayoutType = 'ShowAllInRow', SelectType = 'SelectOne', OneChoiceForAllPlayers = false, ExportOnChange = false, Choices = modList,
LoadSelections = function(self, list, pn) local set,rnd = false,1 for n = 1, table.getn(modList) do if vocalize[pn+1] == modList[n] then list[n] = true; set = true; end if modList[n] == 'Random' then rnd = n; end; end if not set then list[rnd] = true end end,
SaveSelections = function(self, list, pn) for n = 1, table.getn(modList) do if list[n] then vocalize[pn+1] = modList[n] end end end
} setmetatable(t, t) return t end
function VocalizeTest(self,j) local digits = {''} local score = string.gsub(score,'%%','') if score and tonumber(score) <= 100 then local int = math.floor(score) local dec = string.sub(score,string.len(score)-1) if int >= 100 then digits[1] = '100percent' else if int < 20 then digits[1] = int; digits[2] = 'point' elseif math.mod(int,10) == 0 then digits[1] = int; digits[2] = 'point' else digits[1] = int - math.mod(int,10); digits[2] = math.mod(int,10); digits[3] = 'point' end for i=2,4 do if not digits[i] then digits[i] = string.sub(dec,1,1); digits[i+1] = string.sub(dec,2,2) break end end end if digits[j] then if j == 1 then speaker = Voice if Voice == 'Random' then speaker = vocalizeList[math.random(1,table.getn(vocalizeList))] end end
if Voice == 'Blender' then speaker = vocalizeList[math.random(1,table.getn(vocalizeList))] end if digits[j] == '100percent' then digits[j] = digits[j] .. math.random(1,loadstring('if _G[speaker] then return _G[speaker].quads else return 1 end')()) end local Path = VocalizePath() .. speaker ..'/'..digits[j]..'.ogg' SOUND:PlayOnce( Path ) self:sleep(loadstring('if _G[speaker] then return _G[speaker].z' .. digits[j] .. ' else return .5 end')()) if not digits[j+1] then self:sleep(.3) end end end end
function Vocalize(self,pn,j) if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(pn-1) then local score = SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('PercentP'..pn):GetChild('PercentP'..pn):GetText() local digits = {''} score = string.gsub(score,'%%','') if score and tonumber(score) <= 100 then local int = math.floor(score) local dec = string.sub(score,string.len(score)-1) if int >= 100 then digits[1] = '100percent' elseif tonumber(score) == 0 then digits[1] = nil else if int < 20 then digits[1] = int; digits[2] = 'point' elseif math.mod(int,10) == 0 then digits[1] = int; digits[2] = 'point' else digits[1] = int - math.mod(int,10); digits[2] = math.mod(int,10); digits[3] = 'point' end for i=2,4 do if not digits[i] then digits[i] = string.sub(dec,1,1); digits[i+1] = string.sub(dec,2,2) break end end end if digits[j] and vocalize[pn] ~= 'None' then if j == 1 then speaker = vocalize[pn] if vocalize[pn] == 'Random' then speaker = vocalizeList[math.random(2,table.getn(vocalizeList)-7)] end end
if vocalize[pn] == 'Blender' then speaker = vocalizeList[math.random(2,table.getn(vocalizeList)-7)] end if digits[j] == '100percent' then digits[j] = digits[j] .. math.random(1,loadstring('if _G[speaker] then return _G[speaker].quads else return 1 end')()) end local Path = VocalizePath() .. speaker ..'/'..digits[j]..'.ogg' SOUND:PlayOnce( Path ) self:sleep(loadstring('if _G[speaker] then return _G[speaker].z' .. digits[j] .. ' else return .5 end')()) if not digits[j+1] then self:sleep(.3) end end end end end
Alan = { z0 = .7, z1 = .5, z2 = .5, z3 = .6, z4 = .6, z5 = .7, z6 = .8, z7 = .7, z8 = .6, z9 = .6, z10 = .6, z11 = .8, z12 = .8, z13 = 1, z14 = 1, z15 = 1, z16 = 1.2, z17 = 1, z18 = 1, z19 = 1.1, z20 = .7, z30 = .7, z40 = .7, z50 = .7, z60 = .8, z70 = .7, z80 = .7, z90 = .8, z100percent1 = 4.3, zpoint = .5, quads = 1 }
